experiences.name: 100 Black Men of OC HS Volunteer Program
description: Worked with over 40 underprivileged HS students on different departments and fundamentals of game development
Conducted several activities to simulate different strategies in game development to enhance learning experience
Shared experiences in game-dev, college, and post-HS

experiences.name: Games For Love
description: Participated in game jams as a form of charity for children in hospitals
Created assets for logos that are used to represent game jams
